entry.title: $2597 // Great rooftop for watching sunsets over Manhattan
entry.content:
1 Bed / 1 Bath in Bushwick, Brooklyn. Pets Upon Approval. Nearby subway stations include: Morgan Av, Flushing Av. NO FEE Artist Lofts-- Open floorplans, vintage details, & sunlight for days! Great rooftop for watching sunsets over Manhattan. Prime location @ The Morgan L & close to JMZ train. Alternatively, use "the new L" Mercedes Benz shuttle van to Manhattan starting in April 2019!1 Block to Syndicated, The Narrows, Roberta's pizza, Forrest Point, SHINOBI RAMEN. At nightfall, some of the best techno warehouse parties in the US await super close to your loft. Make your friends jealous :)

Call or text Mike: show contact info

entry.title: $1800 // ALL have_@@_ windows & are actual rooms decent size.
entry.content:
2 Bed / 1 Bath in Bed-Stuy, Brooklyn. All Pets Allowed. Nearby subway stations include: Myrtle Av. Real 2BR- NOT a railroad. It's actually nice, too! Rooms aren't huge or anything but c'mon...ALL have windows & are actual rooms decent size. Windows in the living room too. A few blocks from Lone Wolf, Looking Glass etc...--- 20 minutes from Manhattan. Nothing else this price. Text now to schedule visit
